lines.text: Fuck you, fuck you, FUCK YOU!
Fuck you too.
You can't talk to students like that.
Fuck you! Now suit up!
No more fucking around with my emotions!
Paula what are you doing out here?
What do you mean?
Sh-Shouldn't you be in school you're not *cutting class* I hope!
You know, Your fathers a lot bigger than I am. Of course, I bigger where it REALLY counts!
Nice try Dwight, but that's just a rock.

[over p.a.]
I just want to thank the student who drew the crude caricature of me in the boys' lavatory, Although you were kind in your portrayal, I would like it if you kept your talents to the art class.
Ladies first.
Why thank you.
[Colleen walks in front of Paula]
No, I said LADIES first.
Why thank you!
...such an ass!
I'm the custodian of your fucking lives!

[to Paula]
That guy is fried!

[Locked out of the school]
Shultz! I need to get my math book! You know, a book?
The thing with pages?
Yeah!
Never saw one. School is closed!
To be or not to be... Eat me, Dwight!

[to Paula when they are walking into the girls' locker room during the basketball game, about Mr. Dante]
I bet he kisses like a lizard.

[Stopping Paula before they walk out of the locker room]
Our team isn't that great, right?

[Uncertain why Paula is asking]
Right.

[Pulls down her panties and waves them around, finally throwing them to the floor]
This should give them something better to cheer about.
[laughs]

[laughing]
You're unbelievable.
[Both laugh as they leave the locker room]
